channel.title: 0.9.15 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General: * Added new chat tabs to make it easier to view chat history. * Changed the journal to 2D. This might fix some crashes people were having. * Login screen just got faster + some bugs fixed.
## Lobby: * Friend messages now popup in realtime in the lobby. More realtime stuff later!
## Herbalist & Physician: * Now immune to bleed.
## Ritualist: * Strength of Corax now causes Eradicate to also attack visitors to the target in addition to its normal affect.
## Bug Fixes: * Thronebot should now show players online * Hopefully UI bugs are fixed. * Some others.

item.description:

item.title: 0.9.15 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Grizzfang
item.description:
Ellie:

Strength of Corax now causes Eradicate to also attack visitors to the target in addition to its normal affect.

If someone that is being guarded by a knight visits the target of a strengthened Eradicate, will the Cult Leader and Knight kill eachother?

item.title: 0.9.15 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
General:

  • Added new chat tabs to make it easier to view chat history.
  • Changed the journal to 2D. This might fix some crashes people were having.
  • Login screen just got faster + some bugs fixed.

Lobby:

  • Friend messages now popup in realtime in the lobby. More realtime stuff later!

Herbalist & Physician:

  • Now immune to bleed.

Ritualist:

  • Strength of Corax now causes Eradicate to also attack visitors to the target in addition to its normal affect.

Bug Fixes:

  • Thronebot should now show players online
  • Hopefully UI bugs are fixed.
  • Some others.

Read full topic
